name: Visio Studio
description:
Visio Studio allows you to edit and optimise your pictures directly inside Figma or Figjam thanks to a powerful background removal model.


Advanced background removal

â†’ Use our advanced background removal tool, powered by high-end computer vision technology to provide you the pixelcut results.


How to use Visio Studio:


1. Simply select the Frame you want to edit from your Figma or Figjam.


2. With one tap Visio Studio will remove the background of your picture.


3. That's it!


Check https://visio.studio for more information
